response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its high value and potential impact on your operations, I propose a special introductory offer for you. For a limited time, you can acquire this exceptional product at an exclusive price of $14,000. This offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste for quality and innovation in your industry. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your business to new heights. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 14000}
